AMG Bio.txt
info.txt (which is simply these notes included in the torrent)

First biography paragraph from All Music (by Linda Seida):

Even if you don't know the group by name, if you're the tiniest bit familiar with doo wop you'll still probably recognize Randy & the Rainbows' hit single "Denise." A Top Ten hit, it's one of those feel-good songs that continue to turn up on compilations of the best music from the 1960s.
